entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as looking back at Charity with an impassive expression.

entities.name: charity
entities.description: Charity is the one who falls onto the table after being hit by Avada Kedavra.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as saying 'Dinner, Nagini' and having a great snake on his shoulders.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is the great snake that Voldemort has on his shoulders and sways and slithers onto the polished wood.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco falls out of his chair after Charity's fall.

relationships.description: Voldemort has Nagini on his shoulders, as described in the text: 'Dinner, Nagini'.
Charity falls onto the table below after being hit by Avada Kedavra.
Draco falls out of his chair and lands on the floor.
